name: OMNIRICA
description: Come and discover OMNIRICA, a stroboscopic and crazy journey in a dream, indeed, in a series of dreams of a sick mind. Each chapter of the Game is a different type of game: you go from the classic RPG of the first chapter, to the Arcade of the second chapter, to the hack n slash of the third, to the FPS solve enigma of the fourth up to a fighting game. All based on the mouse and keyboard system. Only for true lovers of hard games and wacky experiences, in full Zentam style;)
